it.polimi.se2019.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.util.Observable<Update>
      • it.polimi.se2019.model.Game

  • public class Game
extends Observable<Update>
    Logical class used for handling various interaction between all model classes, that are frequently used in game actions.
    Author:
    Andrea Falanti

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(Board board,
            java.util.List<Player> players,
            int killsToFinish)
        Parameters:
        board - Board selected for the game
        players - List of players
        killsToFinish - Number of kills before triggering final frenzy
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if board or players are null, player size is minor of 3 or killsNum is negative

      • startNextTurn

        public void startNextTurn()
        Start next turn, incrementing turn number, changing active player and setting number of actions. If it's game over, distribute kill points to players and finish the game.

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Calculate if game is finished (all players have done their final frenzy rounds).
        Returns:
        true if final frenzy is over, false if not

      • registerKill

        private void registerKill(PlayerColor killer)
        Add a kill to kills list. If skullNum is reached, starts final frenzy.
        Parameters:
        killer - Player color of the killer

      • registerOverkill

        private void registerOverkill(PlayerColor killer)
        Add an overkill to overkills list.
        Parameters:
        killer - Player color of the killer

      • getPlayerFromColor

        Return a player from given color.
        Parameters:
        color - Color of the player to return
        Returns:
        Player with given color

        private void setFinalFrenzyStatus()
        Set final frenzy status to true and set starting turn of final frenzy.

        Get number of actions that active player can do this turn.
        Returns:
        number of actions

      • distributeTotalKillsScore

        private void distributeTotalKillsScore()
        Give players bonus score points based on kills and overkills done during the game.

      • distributePlayerKillScore

        private void distributePlayerKillScore(PlayerColor deadPlayerColor)
        Distribute score to players that have done damage to killed player.
        Parameters:
        deadPlayerColor - Dead player's color

      • scoreCalculation

        private void scoreCalculation(PlayerColor[] colors,
                              int[] scoreValues,
                              int scoreStartingPos,
                              boolean firstBloodBonus)
        Calculate score and give it to players.
        Parameters:
        colors - Array of PlayerColor to iterate for score calculation
        scoreValues - Score values to apply
        scoreStartingPos - Offset in score values, 0 if not present
        firstBloodBonus - Give bonus point for first blood?

      • handleDamageInteraction

        public void handleDamageInteraction(PlayerColor shooter,
                                    PlayerColor target,
                                    Damage damage)
        Handle game logic about damage action, updating damage taken by target and registering a kill if player is dead.
        Parameters:
        shooter - Player color of the shooter
        target - Player color of the target
        damage - Damage done to target

      • onTurnEnd

        public void onTurnEnd()
        Called on turn end, handleMe all mechanics and rules that activate at turn's end.

        Returns:

        Get current player leaderboard, based on score.
        Returns:
        player list ordered by decreasing score

        Returns:
